title: Alaska Public Lands: Guest Speakers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Guest Speakers              Guest Speakers       The Alaska Centers host a variety of special programs and events featuring guest speakers and partners. Events vary from site-to-site but include Discovery Days in Fairbanks, Friday Night Insight Programs in Ketchikan, and First Saturdays in Anchorage. Special guests include scientists, artists, storytellers, educators, and even live rehabilitated birds & animals.  All programs are free of charge to the public.
